name: Elisa - Full Game
description:
Elisa is a top-down puzzle game in which you need to help the main character (Elisa) finding her ghostly-pet (Flutter) inside a haunted mansion. During the gameplay, you can switch between both characters at any time. Each character have their own puzzles to be solved and bosses to be defeated.

Instructions:
Space Bar - interact
Q - previous item
E - next item
W/A/S/D - walk
Arrows - walk
R - use current item
F - switch characters
